page.title: 02PLACES OF INTEREST
page.content: There are many interesting things to see in Barking. For recreation there are {Barking, Mayesbrook}and{Parsloes {Parks}with open ground and sports facilities. {Eastbury House,}the {Town {Quay, Barking Abbey, St. Margaret's {Church}and the {Curfew Tower}are of historic interest. The town centre is a large shopping area and the Town Hall and other council buildings are nearby. To the south of the A13 there are many small factories and warehouses. On Thames View Estate there is an old power station, but it is now closed. Next to it is a {City Farm.}
